0 Param data.1 string m_text: Ugh, how'd I end up with a lame job like guard duty? This is not my week.
I just can't catch a break.
Of all the assignments...
If he hasn't woken up by now, why would today be the day?
Huh?
WHA!? HE'S AWAKE!
Wait, wait, wait! It wasn't me!
I'm not the one who locked you up in here!
Just stay calm, all right? No sudden movements.
Hngh...
I—ack. Ah...
Is...everything okay?
You lost your voice or something?
Look, just rest. Not being able to talk is the least of your problems.
Right, you're probably wondering who I am.
The name's Kushi.
I wanted to be part of the Blood Guard, but...long story short, I'm stuck here watching you.
Sorry, I didn't mean "stuck" like I don't want to be here. No offense.
It's not the worst job, but it sure isn't the easiest.
Just, uh, don't take it the wrong way. We can get along here. Right?
Kushi... Are you really...Kushi?
What...happened to me?
Kushi... Are you really...Kushi?
Yeah, that's my name.
Ah, but no need to remember it. It's no concern of yours, after all!
What...happened to me?
A little bit of this, a little bit of that.
You were sort of dead, but...now I guess you're alive.
You still seem pretty confused.
As you would be, since you just woke up!
Maybe you just need some time. Some deep breathing might help you remember.
I mean, we don't have all the time in the world, but you should get some rest all the same. How's that sound?
I'll come check on you later, okay?
What's...going on?
How is this...possible?
I look like the...Night Devil!
What's...happening to me?
Hey! HEY!
Somebody! Kushi!
Is anybody there!?
So are you...y'know, REALLY the Night Devil?
Seems rumors of your demise have been greatly exaggerated. Eeeheehee!
I want to meet the Night Devil...
Well c'mon then, Executioner! Give me the goods!
Show me what you can do!
Start with the guard who just left. Kill him.
Yes! A wonderful idea! Show us! Eeeheehee!
Show us the Executioner's technique!
No... I'm not the Night Devil.
My name is...Kagachi. I'm a Watcher!
Eh? So they got the wrong guy?
A Watcher, you say?
Hey now, enough of that. Don't start causin' trouble with the other prisoners.
I don't know where you heard about the Watchers, but that's somethin' the sovereign selects you for. You can't just BE one.
You can only apply when they're recruitin', and the likes of YOU wouldn't make the cut.
I know the Night Devil when I see him. Kills just for the sport of it.
Even if he doesn't know who he is himself, for the time being.
What are you talking about, Kushi? It's me, Kagachi!
You remember me!
Sorry, but I don't know what else to tell you. You're the Night Devil.
And even if you are who you say you are—Kagachi, was it?
I don't know anybody by that name.
Kushi...what do you mean?
Just tell me what's going on! How'd I wind up here?
All right, all right!
Less talking, more thinking. Retrace your steps.
You're a criminal responsible for killing a vast number of people throughout the kingdom.
But you let your thirst for vengeance get the better of you and wound up...well, mostly dead.
What?
You heard me.
You should be dead, and yet here you are talking to me. I don't have any answers for that.
So now it's my turn to ask questions.
Are you actually human?
I—
Cause everyone's desperately calling for you to be "dealt with," if you know what I mean.
So just sit here and stay out of any more trouble 'til the verdict comes in.
Though...
I wouldn't get my hopes up if I were you.
So you've lost your memory, have you? Eeeheehee.
You better remember quick, pal.
They're gonna kill ya anyway, so give us a story to remember ya by while you've got the chance.
Yes, tell us! We want to hear it.
What? What's going on?
Think, Kagachi.
Think about what Kushi said. Maybe there's a hint in there somewhere.
You don't know anything about the Watchers?
Was I really almost dead?
You don't know anything about the Watchers?
Never heard of them. Eeeheehee!
Then how do you save the Lost?
Lost what? Children? Eeeheehee!
Maybe the Watchers don't even exist yet...
Was I really almost dead?
Oh yeah.
I thought for sure they were haulin' in a corpse.
So if you've got any tips on how to go from knockin' on death's door to lookin' like ya do now, I'd love to hear 'em.
I'm not even in any pain, let alone wounded. How is that possible?
What in the Veil is going on here?
Hnh!
What was that? What was that!? WHAT WAS THAT!?
Hey, guard man! Mind tellin' us what that was!?
Tell us now!
That's not good. Listen up, you bastards!
I want everybody quiet! No tricks!
You got that?
Just tell us what's goin' on!
I'm scared! I'm scared! I'm scared!
Eeeeeeheeheehee! Excellent!
Whatever that was, it gave us a great chance to bust outta here!
Quick, quick, quick!
Who am I?
I have to find somewhere to hide. I need time to figure all this out.
Dammit! Looks like the only way out is down...
Ngh.
Well...I guess I didn't die.
Time to find somewhere to hide, and fast.
I need your help. Let me in.
I didn't mean to startle you.
I won't stay long... Please, you have to let me inside.
I beg you.
Okay. This way.
I'm sorry.
I know this is very sudden.
You needn't apologize.
In that case...would you mind looking out the window?
It looks like they've gone.
So...
Are they chasing you?
Yes.
But I don't remember why.
For that matter, I don't really know what's happening at all.
That's why I'm here. I just need some time to piece it all together.
I can't let them find me. Not now.
I-If you say so...
It looks like the coast is clear.
I'll be on my way. Sorry to trouble you.
Hngh...
You won't get very far in that state. Maybe you should rest first.
I can't impose on you like that.
I can't let them find me like this...
I can't impose on you like that.
I don't mind. Stay until your wounds have healed, at the very least.
Thank you. That's very kind of you.
I can't let them find me like this...
You're welcome to stay until you can get around better.
Thanks. Sorry for the trouble.
It's fine.
It's for the best.
I'm feeling much better. Thank you.
Where will you go from here?
I'm not sure.
For now I just want to remain hidden.
Then why not stay here?
I can't draw you into this any more than I already have.
I should leave.
If you insist.
They'll find you if you leave.
I'll figure something out.
Of course you will.
You look like the type who could.
So... Why did you do it?
Why did you kill him?
He meant so much to us.
GIVE HIM BACK TO US! YOU GIVE HIM BACK RIGHT NOW!
You think I'm the Night Devil, too!?
Don't play dumb with me, you murderer!
There's no mistaking you!
Look, I'm sorry.
I can't let you kill me for something I don't remember doing.
I have to figure out what's happening to me.
I hate you... Murderer...
You'll pay for this...
You took him from me.
I'll never forgive you.
I'll never forgive you for what you've taken from me!
You monster! Filthy Daemon!
I'm sorry...
Linne!
Hey, are you all right?
Oh, I'm sorry. I can't see.
Did you come all the way out here by yourself?
I've been recovering at the hospital in town. They told me I could go back home, so I've been waiting for my dad.
But he never came. It's been days now.
He's always really busy working to take care of us. I bet he's at work right now.
So I decided to try and find my own way home. You know, to surprise him!
I see.
Well this road is too dangerous for you to be traveling alone. I'll help you find your village.
You will?
Sure.
Thank you. You're so nice.
It'll be good to have someone to talk to.
What's your name?
Yut. What's yours?
Kagachi.
It's Kagachi.
You sound more like a Kachi. Can I call you Kachi?
Sure, go ahead.
Okey dokey!
Do you need to rest?
Am I walking too slow?
No, that's not what I meant. I just don't want you to end up back in the hospital.
Thanks, Kachi.
You're too polite for a kid. Kids are supposed to talk back.
Huh. You think so?
Would you really want to be around a kid like that?
I don't mind. I'm used to it.
Why's that? Did you have brothers or sisters?
Yeah, you could say that. She was an expert in getting under my skin.
Hehe, okay.
Then I'll stop being so nice!
That isn't quite the response I was hoping for, but sure. Go nuts.
Haha, you're funny!
Okay, I'm feeling better now. Let's go, Kachi!
What's wrong?
Stop walking. I'm tired!
That how I'm supposed to talk?
That'll do. Let's rest.
Hehe, I'm gonna try this on my dad when I get home.
Skip the part where you heard it from me.
Maybe, maybe not. What'll you do if I tell?
I'll get yelled at along with you, for teaching you bad manners.
My dad won't get mad. He's nice.
Oh yeah?
Well, he's nice to me.
Just you?
Mmhmm.
When he goes out, he's a little scary. He yells at people a lot.
That doesn't sound good.
Aw, don't worry, Kachi. He won't yell at you. I'll tell him not to!
You'll head him off, will you?
What was that? What's going on?
Don't worry. Just stay quiet for a second.
Kachi? Are you there? Is everything okay?
Yeah, I'm right here.
We should get moving.
Okay. I'm ready to go.
Are we almost there? We are, aren't we? I can't wait to see my dad.
So whaddaya think, Kachi? Pretty nice village, huh?
Are you sure we're in the right place?
Well I can't see it, but it smells like home to me!
There's another smell, though. A funny smell.
What is that, anyway?
Wait here, Yut.
I'm going to go look for your dad.
Yeah, good idea! I wanna surprise him!
My house is the one on the far end of the village.
I'll hide somewhere and wait! Bring my dad, and don't let him peek!
Sweet souls, what happened here?
Yut!
Who is that?
Hey! Yut!
Y-You're the Night Devil!
Hey, hey, hey, whoa!
Don't come any closer!
It's okay. That's just Kachi.
He helped me get home.
That's impossible! The Night Devil doesn't help people!
Huh?
He did this to our village!
Did what to our village? Tell me! What did he do!?
Kachi!
What did you do to my village!?
I don't know.
I don't know any more than you do.
Don't listen to him!
I saw everything!
I watched as... As he...
As he killed everyone!
No, you're...you're lying. Kachi wouldn't do that...would you, Kachi?
What about my dad?
My dad's still alive, isn't he!?
No, Yut.
Everyone...everyone's dead! He killed them all!
No... No...
Your dad was all ready to go get you.
That was when he...he attacked.
Is that true, Kachi? Is it?
Why?
Why would you do something like that?
Why, Kachi?
Kachi, please...
Tell me!
Get out of here.
Leave us alone, you monster!
Look after Yut.
Could I really be the Night Devil?
Mayura!
Gah! The Night Devil!?
Kushi!
No, no, no! Not you again!
I thought you were someone else.
Of all the people it had to be...
Is this the worst day of my life, or what?
Maybe.
Not maybe—definitely!
How in the Living World did you survive that fall without a scratch on you?
I think Mayura might have drawn you to me.
Who's Mayura?
I haven't met a single friendly face yet.
Well, you haven't lived a very friendly life.
Just tell me one thing.
If I am the Night Devil...what year is this?
You...you really don't remember.
It's the start of a new era. Sovereign Sara has just ascended to the throne.
Sovereign Sara? The one who was executed?
Watch your treasonous mouth! Someone might hear you!
Why would you say such a thing?
So it's before the execution...
That means I've gone back in time and...become the Night Devil before he died?
Are you feeling all right?
This must have happened because of what I did in the future.
It'd take too long to explain, at any rate.
The future?
I've gotta say, you're nothing like I imagined. I thought you were just some mindless, murderous beast.
I'll listen to your story, if you're willing to tell it.
Kushi...
Hmmm.
Uh...huh.
Hrrrmmm.
Ahhh, so his soul split in two!
So the Night Devil can't reincarnate, and that's the source of his hatred. Have I got that right?
Yeah.
Then you took your own life to save him, which reincarnated you in the past, right when you were on death's doorstep?
That is, quite frankly, insane.
And I have absolutely zero proof.
But if what you say is true, then you've got no reason to lie to me.
All right. I'm convinced.
You haven't changed a bit, Kushi.
What's that supposed to mean?
Well, whatever.
Listen, say that name one more time.
Which name?
Go on. I won't tell anyone.
The name you said before. Mayura, right?
That was the name of a character in a picture book I loved as a kid.
She was the main character, and at the end of the book she'd always thank me—er, the reader—for reading her story.
That meant the world to me at the time.
So much, in fact, that that's when I decided.
If I ever got married and had a daughter, I'd name her Mayura.
Is that right?
You know her, don't you? Mayura, I mean.
I do. She's your daughter.
My daughter!
Future me must be the happiest man alive!
Yeah, he really is.
Actually...
Yeah, he really is.
I knew it! Whew, that makes me feel better!
Actually...
We should get going.
But, uh, let me just say this...
And keep in mind, I don't know exactly what's going on.
But we're not gonna get anywhere unless you learn more about what's going on with you.
That's more important than trying to come up with theories about how all this happened.
And I'm not talking about you as the Night Devil. I mean you as a person. That make sense?
Yeah, you might be right.
Start with anything you can remember and work from there.
If you can't remember, keep looking.
Now go.
And don't get caught until you've figured it out.
Thanks, Kushi.
